The hunt is on!ControlsLeft Click: ShootRight Click/Mouse Scroll: Zoom/aimWASD: MoveSpace: JumpR: ReloadEsc/Tab: PauseHow to Play Sniper ReloadedChoose from two distinct maps: one set in a rural landscape and the other perched atop a skyscraper in the heart of a city.Your mission is to take down enemies one by one with your sniper rifle. The accuracy of your shots matters—whether you land a headshot, body shot, or leg shot, you'll earn bonus points accordingly.Additionally, you'll score extra points for hitting long-distance targets.You start with 100 HP, and each time you're hit, your health decreases by 1 point.Aim to beat your own score before your HP runs out.Distant Battle to Intense CombatsIf you cleared all the enemies in your sight, jump down from the building to get closer to other enemies hiding between buildings.Beware that you'll be more open to any attacks in the streets.Fine Tune Your AimTo become a better sniper, it's important to understand how your H (Horizontal Angle) and V (Vertical Angle) work. These are your guides for adjusting your aim. You'll see these values when you zoom in with the rifle.Horizontal Angle (H): This tells you how far left or right your crosshair is from your target. Adjust the H value to keep up with running enemies, and make sure you're lined up for a perfect shot.Vertical Angle (V): V value shows how much you've moved your aim up or down. It's useful when aiming at enemies on different levels, like those on rooftops. Getting the right vertical angle is key for hitting targets that are far away or getting those headshots.By watching these angles, you can tweak your aim and improve your precision. Take your time, stay focused, and use these tips to get more accurate hits in Sniper Reloaded!DeveloperFreezeNova Games Studio developer Sniper Reloaded.More Sniper Games OnlineIf you enjoyed Sniper Reloaded, there are plenty of online sniper games to explore on OnlineGames.io.
